abstract: If Tim Tebow does well, the Broncos will prosper, and that's good news for all. For Denver management, failure would also have its benefits.
snippet: If Tim Tebow does well, the Broncos will prosper, and that's good news for all. For Denver management, failure would also have its benefits.
lead_paragraph: Judy Battista on Tim Tebow Time:

headline.main: It's Tebow Time, and John Fox Can't Lose
